mapper.select: SELECT total_visitors_count, total_participate_member_count, total_page_forward_count, total_effective_sharing_count, total_register_members_count FROM t_mkt_golden_statistics WHERE mkt_activity_id = #{activityId} AND valid = 1 ORDER BY statistics_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT visitors_count, participate_member_count, page_forward_count, effective_sharing_count, register_members_count, hour_json_data FROM t_mkt_golden_statistics WHERE valid = 1 AND mkt_activity_id = #{activityId} AND statistics_time >= #{startDates} AND statistics_time <= #{endDates}

SELECT visitors_count, participate_member_count, page_forward_count, effective_sharing_count, register_members_count, DATE_FORMAT( statistics_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) statisticsTimes FROM t_mkt_golden_statistics WHERE valid = 1 AND mkt_activity_id = #{activityId} AND statistics_time >= #{startDates} AND statistics_time <= #{endDates} ORDER BY statistics_time
